org.mapdb

Class StoreTrivial

  • org.mapdb.StoreTrivial
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConcurrencyAware, Store, StoreImmutable, Verifiable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StoreTrivialTx

    public class StoreTrivial
implements Store

    Store which serializes its content into primitive Map. It optionally persist its content into file, in this case it supports rollback and durability.
